transArray.content: The environment of this store is very warm. There is a dedicated office area in the lobby. Freshly ground coffee, fresh oranges, and snacks are all free. The corners of the room are very clean, which is reassuring.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel's environment and hygiene. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. Cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every stay. Thank you! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
